Package interfaces

Interface GeneralReposInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
GeneralRepository
public interface GeneralReposInterface extends Remote
Operational interface of a remote object of type ConcentrationSite. It provides the functionality to access the Concentration Site.
